name: asw-cookbook
description: CookBook is a web app for those who love to cook and/or eat healthy. The platform aims to offer the exchange of recipes (traditional or customized) of all sorts of food (appetizers, first courses, main courses, desserts, drinks, condiments, ...) ## Requirements - docker-compose

scripts.install:sub-projects: (cd shared && npm install) && (cd environment && npm install) && (cd cookbook-app && npm install) && (cd cookbook-server && npm install)
scripts.build: (cd shared && npm run shared:build) && (cd cookbook-server && npm run server:build) && (cd cookbook-app && npm run client:build:tsc && npm run client:build:production)
scripts.clean:typescrypt: (cd shared && npm run clean) && (cd cookbook-app && npm run clean) && (cd cookbook-server && npm run clean)

author: Marica Pasquali
